Articles.Content: Can you all be a little more careful about posting info on what the easter eggs are?! I already know what five of them are without having landed at a single one myself. There have even been recent forum posts with spoilers in the thread title! I mean, c'mon! A little bit of respect for those of us who are actually still exploring in this game, thanks!
It'd help if spoiler tags worked, shame they are buggy and had to be disabled.

Honestly, I'd treat the coordinates like UFO sightings. Just because you have a set of coordinates doesn't mean you've found it. I've not had any luck looking for them and finding some of them when I have the coordinates can be pretty difficult.

There is one not 65km from the space center and I know where it is and I still can't find the blasted thing.
